a.n: Art Blakey & The Jazz Messengers: Live

p.k: Art Blakey & The Jazz Messengers: Live in '58 1958. Art Blakey. Belgium's Palais des Beaux Arts, Brussels, Belgium
p.d: Art Blakey: Live in '58 features what many consider to be one of the finest line-ups in the history of jazzâ€”Art Blakey (Drums), Bobby Timmons (Piano), Jymie Merritt (Bass), Benny Golson (Sax) and the legendary trumpet player, Lee Morgan. Lost for nearly 50 years, this historic 55-minute concert, filmed in Belgium in 1958, one month to the day after they recorded their masterpiece Moanin', is the only known visual document of this influential band who were together for only six months.
